Title: Relates to the posting of certain COVID-19 vaccine disbursement information on the website of the department of health
Summary: Relates to the posting of certain COVID-19 vaccine disbursement information on the internet website of the department of health; establishes such information shall include, but not be limited to, the total number of vaccine doses disbursed to, address of, and selection method of each approved vaccine provider and state operated point of dispensing site.
LawCode: Amd ยง206, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the posting of certain COVID-19 vaccine disbursement information on the website of the department of health; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
